word:
Many are deceived in regard to their own experience. A deception in the heart will lead to the doing of 
                                                                           45
strange things which God has not directed. But whatever may be the pretensions, God reads the heart as we would read an open book. Warnings are sometimes given to prevent those whose past experience has been defective, and who are prone to go contrary to the will and word of God, from taking a course that would bring reproach upon His cause.
